Question
========

At Dutch universities, 3% of students annually move on advance to a doctoral position after graduation. After 10 years, 80% of the PhD students are still working at a scientific institute. What is the probability that a randomly selected university student 10 years after graduation is employed at a scientific institute?

Answerlist
----------

* 0,024
* 0,062
* 0,125
* 0,830

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.024: Correct
* 0.062: Incorrect
* 0.125: Incorrect
* 0.830: Incorrect
